comments.body: Is it possible that the following steps take too long and the device locks again? Should unlock maybe happen right before we actually use the device?

The devices are configured to never lock automatically. Some of our tests run for >20 minutes and rely on them being unlocked all the time. Instead, [the devicelab infra locks the screen](https://github.com/flutter/cocoon/blob/c5e229aa8d7ff890493a0b0fb163cfd2cb27e0ad/agent/lib/src/commands/ci.dart#L104) when the test is done.
